title: First Dinosaur Fossil Identified
description: The first dinosaur fossil, later named Megalosaurus, was scientifically described by William Buckland.

title: Iguanodon Discovery
description: Gideon Mantell discovers teeth and bones of the dinosaur Iguanodon.

title: Hylaeosaurus Discovery
description: Gideon Mantell discovers Hylaeosaurus, one of the first three dinosaurs ever found.

title: Hadrosaurus Discovery
description: The first nearly complete dinosaur skeleton in North America is discovered and later named Hadrosaurus.

title: Archaeopteryx Discovery
description: A fossil of Archaeopteryx, showing features of both dinosaurs and birds, is discovered.

title: Stegosaurus Discovery
description: Othniel Charles Marsh describes and names the dinosaur Stegosaurus.

title: Diplodocus Discovery
description: The dinosaur Diplodocus is discovered by Samuel Wendell Williston and later named by Othniel Charles Marsh.

title: Triceratops Discovery
description: The first fossils of Triceratops are discovered by John Bell Hatcher.

title: Tyrannosaurus Rex Discovery
description: The first fossils of Tyrannosaurus Rex are discovered by Barnum Brown.

title: Spinosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Spinosaurus are discovered by Richard Markgraf.

title: Velociraptor Discovery
description: The first fossils of Velociraptor are discovered by Peter Kaisen.

title: Argentinosaurus Discovery
description: The fossils of Argentinosaurus, one of the largest known land animals, are discovered.

title: Allosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Allosaurus are discovered by Ferdinand V. Hayden.

title: Apatosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Apatosaurus, initially named Brontosaurus, are discovered by Othniel Charles Marsh.

title: Brachiosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Brachiosaurus are discovered by Elmer S. Riggs.

title: Deinonychus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Deinonychus are discovered by Barnum Brown.

title: Giganotosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Giganotosaurus, one of the largest known terrestrial carnivores, are discovered.

title: Ankylosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Ankylosaurus are discovered by Barnum Brown.

title: Pachycephalosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Pachycephalosaurus are discovered by Charles W. Gilmore.

title: Protoceratops Discovery
description: The first fossils of Protoceratops are discovered by Roy Chapman Andrews.

title: Psittacosaurus Discovery
description: The first fossils of Psittacosaurus are discovered by Henry Fairfield Osborn.
